name: Affari Tuoi

task.description: Installing Affari Tuoi, don't change default settings.
task.name: wineexec

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Mindscape/Affari Tuoi/DOND.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xna31
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: AffariTuoi_0.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Affari Tuoi, don't change default settings.
    executable: $DISC/AffariTuoi_0.exe
    name: wineexec
